00040         {

00043                 login = tboxLogin.Text,

00053         private void LoginUser()
00054         {
00055             if (InvokeRequired)
00056             {
00057                 Invoke(new Action(LoginUser));
00058                 return;
00059             }
00060 
00061             User.Login = tboxLogin.Text;
00062             MainForm form = new MainForm();
00063             form.ShowDialog();
00064         }
00065 
00066         private void LoginFailed()
00067         {
00068             if (InvokeRequired)
00069             {
00070                 Invoke(new Action(LoginFailed));
00071                 return;
00072             }
00073 
00074             tboxLogin.Text = "";
00075             tboxPassword.Text = "";
00076             MessageBox.Show("Incorrect login or password", "Cannot login");
00077         }
00078 
00079         private void CheckUserCredentials(object param)
00080         {
00081             UserCredentials credentials = (UserCredentials)param;
00082             ServiceManager service = new ServiceManager();
00083             if (service.LoginUser(credentials.login, credentials.password))
00084                 LoginUser();
00085             else
00086                 LoginFailed();
00087         }
00088 
00089         private void FormLoad(object sender, EventArgs e)
00090         {
00091             this.MenuBar.LeftMenu = "Exit";
00092             this.MenuBar.LeftMenuClicked += new EventHandler(ExitApplication);
00093 
00094             this.MenuBar.RightMenu = "SIP";
00095             this.MenuBar.RightMenuClicked += new EventHandler(ToogleSIP);
00096         }
